titleStmt.title: The epistle to the monthly and quarterly meetings of Friends in England, Wales, and elsewhere from our yearly meeting, held in London the fifth, sixth, seventh, and eighth days of the fourth month, 1693.
titleStmt.author: Society of Friends.
Bealing, Benjamin, d. 1739.

notesStmt.note: "Signed in behalf of our said meeting by Benjamin Bealing."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
